text: 2nd review, on top of the bus, being early by 1 to 2 minutes, causing confusion whether you missed it or not. The bus may not even come at all. On their screen shows, bus 85 was arriving in 6 minutes. Me and a few others stood there waiting like a bunch of idiots, 6 minutes later, it says arriving and later switches to arriving in 8 minutes. As per usual, their reply to my feedback is that we will look into this matter and proceeds to do nothing.

My son was boarding Bus No. 85 at Sengkang West Way towards Punggol Bus Interchange on 20/10/2024 at 5.30pm. The bus driver closed the front door while my son was still going up the bus. The bus door hit my sonâ€™s cello which he was carrying on his back and the impact of the door closing cracked the cello. Anyone knows where can I file a complaint over this matter?
No one at Customer services, ask bus driver no willing to help
Another interchange plagued by poor traffic planning wasting commuters time.
